${ModID}:Blindside.NAME: Blindside
${ModID}:Blindside.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bony. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E].

${ModID}:BoneMissile.NAME: Bone Missile
${ModID}:BoneMissile.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bony. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Karma.

${ModID}:Encircle.NAME: Encircle
${ModID}:Encircle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever the target takes unblocked attack damage this turn, gain 1 temporary Strength. NL stslib:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!

${ModID}:JudgementForm.NAME: Judgement Form
${ModID}:JudgementForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 ${ModID}:Sidestep and lose 1 Strength, Dexterity or Focus.
${ModID}:JudgementForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 ${ModID}:Sidestep and lose 1 Strength, Dexterity or Focus.

${ModID}:OpeningGambit.NAME: Opening Gambit
${ModID}:OpeningGambit.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Karma. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Sidestep. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:ReverseGravity.NAME: Reverse Gravity
${ModID}:ReverseGravity.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If the last card played was an attack, apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Karma.

${ModID}:SurviveThis.NAME: Survive This!
${ModID}:SurviveThis.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bony. NL Apply 5 Karma. NL Deal !D! damage a number of times equal to the enemy's ${ModID}:Karma.
${ModID}:SurviveThis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bony. NL Apply 5 Karma. NL Deal !D! damage a number of times equal to twice the enemy's ${ModID}:Karma.

${ModID}:WeightOfYourSins.NAME: Weight of your Sins
${ModID}:WeightOfYourSins.DESCRIPTION: Every time you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 1 ${ModID}:Karma.
